title: Optimize e2e test performance (currently ~2m 30s)
description:
## Problem
e2e tests take ~2m 30sec to run, slowing down pull requests and merges.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Profile current e2e test execution to identify bottlenecks
- [ ] Implement parallel test execution if possible
- [ ] Optimize test setup/teardown processes
- [ ] Target sub-1 minute runtime for complete e2e test suite
- [ ] Document any changes to test configuration

## Labels
epic
